--- In archive-crawler@yah=
oogroups.com, "Jian" <fanchyna@...> wrote:
>
> I was crawling using Heritri=
x 1.14.4 using 5000 seed URLs. I used the default deciding rules in all par=
ts except the writer. I used the mirrorwriter and only download application=
/pdf files to our archive. 
> 
> The crawling progresses fast between 0-90%=
 but after that the crawl becomes very slow. Particularly, the number of ac=
tive threads is very low. Out of the 50 threads, only 1-5 are active. How d=
oes this happen? Why are there so many idle threads?
>
